audioText: Mon chien sort toujours dans le jardin après ses repas pour se détendre.
question: When does the dog go outside?
options: Instead of his meals to hunt
explanation: The text states 'Mon chien sort toujours dans le jardin après ses repas pour se détendre' - My dog always goes out into the garden after his meals to relax. 'Sort' is the 3rd person singular present of 'sortir' (to go out), and 'après ses repas' means after his meals.
